readable.title: 2822148499_eaa46c99d4
readable.content: A brown and white dog is looking at a tennis ball floating in a pool . a brown and white dog looking into a pool at a tennis ball . A brown and white dog walks down a ramp toward a pool of water in which a green tennis ball floats . A dog descends a ramp into the pool to get a tennis ball . A dog looking at a tennis ball floating in a pool .
